title: How many total tokens can be earned for the duration of the event?

replies.body:
I WANT THEM GEMSTONES AND HEX TECH ANNIE

I WANT IT
Im wondering too, But I guess it's 280 because the last border.

> [{quoted}](name= ParlorMan,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=nikVAJ33,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-06-15T23:22:22.267+0000)
>
> Im wondering too, But I guess it's 280 because the last border.

Well at least 30 per day, with 20 the first day (not sure if other missions will give more than 10).

Buying the thing gives more missions and doubled tokens.
